channel.title: Missing return statement?

item.title: Missing return statement?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:2, topic:301652”] public int GetWepAnim(int id) { return attacksHandler.GetWepAnim(id, this); }

the GetWepAnim method in the attacksHandler class will also have to return an integer value for this to work.[/quote]

Stupidity gets the best of us.

Thanks, Rich!

Feel free to lock.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing return statement?

item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public int GetWepAnim(int id) { return attacksHandler.GetWepAnim(id, this); }

the GetWepAnim method in the attacksHandler class will also have to return an integer value for this to work.

item.title: Missing return statement?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

I’m handing the getWepAnim via a new handler, and when I changed the code in class client to this:

public int GetWepAnim(int id){ attacksHandler.GetWepAnim(id, this); }

It’s returning this error:

client.java:3523: missing return statement } ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Any suggestions?

Read full topic
